How do you take the subtitles off? The picture and audio are PRISTINE!! 10/10 for a/v! But the stupid subtitles are damn distracting
SIKE! nevermind! I just figured it out... If you just delete the .SRT files or actually, just run the movie in a separate folder without the .SRT files, no subtitles appear on the screen.
